name: @tilecloud/mbgl-gesture-handling
description: This is a Mapbox GL JS plugin that handles wheel and touch gestures to prevent unexpected zooming and moving for the map embeded in your web site.

scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:lib: npm test && microbundle build src/mbgl-gesture-handling.js -o dist -f cjs
scripts.build:docs: rm -fr docs && parcel build -d docs example/index.html --public-url '.' && touch docs/.nojekyll

author: tilecloud.io
